summary: Logo and hero image sources were updated in Header/Footer/Hero to point to the uploaded Gemini images, but the actual image asset files were not added to the repo per the diff summary, so REQ-24 is not implemented. REQ-25 and REQ-26 appear implemented at the component level (image src replacements and hero overlay retained), though the required assets are not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 4 user-uploaded image files to the frontend as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/uploaded/` (or `frontend/public/assets/generated/` if that is the existing convention for site images), preserving the original filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files (Added: 0; ADDED FILES: none), so there is no evidence that the four PNG assets were committed under `frontend/public/assets/...`.
